item.title: Useful keyboard shortcuts for terminal
item.description: Terminal clipboard, check it out :) ctrl + u = Cut to the clipboard ctrl + y = Paste from the clipboard

item.title: Debian 9: Change the network from enp3s0 to eth0
1998 vs 2017
item.description: 1998: Don’t get into strangers’s cars Don’t meet people from the internet 2017: Literally summon strangers from the internet to get into their car

item.title: Quick way to add new posts in Jekyll with Python
item.description: To make life a little easier from datetime import datetime MYPOST = """\ --- layout: post title: "{0}" date: {1} +0200 categories: {2} --- here my text """ if __name__ == "__main__": title = raw_input("Title:\n") categories = raw_input("Categories:\n") if not categories: categories = "posts" timestamp = datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d%H:%M:%S") datestamp = datetime.today().strftime("%Y-%m-%d") filename = datestamp + "-" + "-".join(title.split(" ")) + ".md" filename = filename.lower() with open(filename, "w+") as file: file.write(MYPOST.format(title, timestamp, categories))
